text: Enable analytics for anonymized usage metrics.
API rate limit is 600 req/min. Use exponential backoff.
If the app crashes on start, try clearing cache and reinstalling.
Restore backup via Settings -> Backup -> Restore.
Supported browsers: Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge.
Contact support@example.com or open ticket in-app.
Export data from Settings -> Data & Privacy -> Export Data.
Manage email notifications from Settings -> Notifications.
503 happens during maintenance. Retry after a few minutes.
Feature flags roll out gradually across accounts.
Download .dmg, drag to Applications, then open.
Download installer.exe and allow in Windows Defender if blocked.
API integration uses Authorization: Bearer <API_KEY>.
If login returns error 401, verify username/password. If using SSO, ensure your token is valid.
Passwords require 8 chars with letters and numbers.
Payment failed errors occur due to expired card or insufficient funds.
We collect minimal data required for functionality.
To reset your password, go to Settings -> Account -> Reset Password. A reset link is sent to your registered email.
Cancel subscription in Billing -> Cancel Subscription.
Two-factor sends a 6-digit code. If not received, request a new one.
